Class Cashier

java.lang.Object
Cashier
public class Cashier extends Object
Cashier: The Cashier Class uses the bank class and manipulates the total amount stored in the bank class It sets the exchange rate for USD to SWD and calculates change.

    • calculateChange

      public Map<BigDecimal,Integer> calculateChange(BigDecimal amount, boolean SWD)
      calculateChange: creates a hashmap to store change then uses the parameter SWD to determine if the user wants to withdrawal SWD or USD then adds the respective Keys and Values. it then checks if the Key at a given entry subtracting the amount is greater than 0.00. If so the value at the given key is incremented by 1. If the given entry key is subracting the amount is less than 0.00 the next key is tried until it satisfies teh conditional.
      Parameters:
      amount - a BigDecimal which represents the amount to be broken into change
      SWD - a boolean that determines if the user wants to withdrawal SWD or USD
      Returns:
      returns a Map of the calculated change.

    • transaction

      public int transaction(float amount, bank account, boolean SWD, int sign)
      transaction: updates the amount in the passed bank dependent on the parameters.
      Parameters:
      amount - a float of the desired amount to be added or subtracted from the total stored in the bank.
      account - a bank class that is to be deposited to or withdrawn from.
      SWD - a boolean that determines the type of currency being deposited or withdrawn
      sign - an int that determines if this transaction is a withdrawal or a deposit.
      Returns:
      returns a 0 or 1 depending on if the withdrawal is too large.
